verses.verse: And he <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> hath taken <S%H3947>away<s%> all that was our <S%H1>father's<s%>; and of that which was our <S%H1>father's<s%> hath he <S%H6213>gotten<s%> all this <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>beheld<s%> the <S%H6440>countenance<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, and, behold, it was not toward him <S%H8543>as<s%> <S%H8032>before<s%>. as before: Heb. as yesterday and the day before
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H7725>Return<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and to thy <S%H4138>kindred<s%>; and I will be with thee.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> to the <S%H7704>field<s%> unto his <S%H6629>flock<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, I <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6440>countenance<s%>, that it is not toward me <S%H8543>as<s%> <S%H8032>before<s%>; but the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> hath <S%H1961>been<s%> with me.
And <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that with all my <S%H3581>power<s%> I have <S%H5647>served<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>.

And your <S%H1>father<s%> hath <S%H2048>deceived<s%> me, and <S%H2498>changed<s%> my <S%H4909>wages<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4489>times<s%>; but <S%H430>God<s%> suffered <S%H5414>him<s%> not to <S%H7489>hurt<s%> <S%H5978>me<s%>.

If he <S%H559>said<s%> thus, The <S%H5348>speckled<s%> shall be thy <S%H7939>wages<s%>; then all the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H5348>speckled<s%>: and if he <S%H559>said<s%> thus, The <S%H6124>ringstraked<s%> shall be thy <S%H7939>hire<s%>; then <S%H3205>bare<s%> all the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> <S%H6124>ringstraked<s%>.
Thus <S%H430>God<s%> hath taken <S%H5337>away<s%> the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H5414>given<s%> them to me.

And it came to pass at the <S%H6256>time<s%> that the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> <S%H3179>conceived<s%>, that I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and, behold, the <S%H6260>rams<s%> which <S%H5927>leaped<s%> upon the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> were <S%H6124>ringstraked<s%>, <S%H5348>speckled<s%>, and <S%H1261>grisled<s%>. rams: or, he goats
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto me in a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, saying, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>: And I <S%H559>said<s%>, Here am I.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> now thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%>, all the <S%H6260>rams<s%> which <S%H5927>leap<s%> upon the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> are <S%H6124>ringstraked<s%>, <S%H5348>speckled<s%>, and <S%H1261>grisled<s%>: for I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all that <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> unto thee.

I am the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel<s%>, where thou <S%H4886>anointedst<s%> the <S%H4676>pillar<s%>, and where thou <S%H5087>vowedst<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto me: now <S%H6965>arise<s%>, get thee <S%H3318>out<s%> from this <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of thy <S%H4138>kindred<s%>.

And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Is there yet any <S%H2506>portion<s%> or <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for us in our <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>?
Are we not <S%H2803>counted<s%> of him <S%H5237>strangers<s%>? for he hath <S%H4376>sold<s%> us, and hath <S%H398>quite<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> also our <S%H3701>money<s%>.

For all the <S%H6239>riches<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5337>taken<s%> from our <S%H1>father<s%>, that is ours, and our <S%H1121>children's<s%>: now then, whatsoever <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> unto thee, <S%H6213>do<s%>.
Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H5375>set<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H802>wives<s%> upon <S%H1581>camels<s%>;

And he carried <S%H5090>away<s%> all his <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, and all his <S%H7399>goods<s%> which he had <S%H7408>gotten<s%>, the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of his <S%H7075>getting<s%>, which he had <S%H7408>gotten<s%> in <S%H6307>Padanaram<s%>, for to <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1494>shear<s%> his <S%H6629>sheep<s%>: and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H1589>stolen<s%> the <S%H8655>images<s%> that were her <S%H1>father's<s%>. images: Heb. teraphim

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> stole <S%H1589>away<s%> <S%H3820>unawares<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian<s%>, in <S%H5921>that<s%> he <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H1097>not<s%> that he <S%H1272>fled<s%>. unawares: Heb. the heart of Laban

So he <S%H1272>fled<s%> with all that he had; and he rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H1272>fled<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> with him, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> after <S%H310>him<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%>; and they <S%H1692>overtook<s%> him in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> that thou <S%H1696>speak<s%> not <S%H5973>to<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> either <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad<s%>. either: Heb. from good to bad

Then <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5381>overtook<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>. Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had <S%H8628>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%>: and <S%H3837>Laban<s%> with his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H8628>pitched<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, What hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%>, that thou hast stolen <S%H1589>away<s%> <S%H3824>unawares<s%> to me, and carried <S%H5090>away<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, as <S%H7617>captives<s%> taken with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>?

Wherefore didst thou flee <S%H1272>away<s%> <S%H2244>secretly<s%>, and steal <S%H1589>away<s%> from me; and didst not <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, that I might have sent thee <S%H7971>away<s%> with <S%H8057>mirth<s%>, and with <S%H7892>songs<s%>, with <S%H8596>tabret<s%>, and with <S%H3658>harp<s%>? steal: Heb. hast stolen me
And hast not <S%H5203>suffered<s%> me to <S%H5401>kiss<s%> my <S%H1121>sons<s%> and my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>? thou hast now done <S%H5528>foolishly<s%> in so <S%H6213>doing<s%>.

It <S%H3426>is<s%> in the <S%H410>power<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> you <S%H7451>hurt<s%>: but the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto me <S%H570>yesternight<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Take thou <S%H8104>heed<s%> that thou speak <S%H1696>not<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> either <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad<s%>.

And now, though thou wouldest <S%H1980>needs<s%> be <S%H1980>gone<s%>, because thou <S%H3700>sore<s%> <S%H3700>longedst<s%> after thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, yet wherefore hast thou <S%H1589>stolen<s%> my <S%H430>gods<s%>?

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, Because I was <S%H3372>afraid<s%>: for I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6435>Peradventure<s%> thou wouldest take by <S%H1497>force<s%> thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> from me.

With <S%H834>whomsoever<s%> thou <S%H4672>findest<s%> thy <S%H430>gods<s%>, let him not <S%H2421>live<s%>: <S%H5048>before<s%> our <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H5234>discern<s%> thou what is thine with me, and <S%H3947>take<s%> it to thee. For <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H1589>stolen<s%> them.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H168>tent<s%>, and into <S%H3812>Leah's<s%> <S%H168>tent<s%>, and into the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H519>maidservants'<s%> <S%H168>tents<s%>; but he <S%H4672>found<s%> them not. Then went he <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah's<s%> <S%H168>tent<s%>, and <S%H935>entered<s%> into <S%H7354>Rachel's<s%> <S%H168>tent<s%>.

Now <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H8655>images<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them in the <S%H1581>camel's<s%> <S%H3733>furniture<s%>, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> upon them. And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H4959>searched<s%> all the <S%H168>tent<s%>, but <S%H4672>found<s%> them not. searched: Heb. felt

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1>father<s%>, Let it not <S%H2734>displease<s%> <S%H5869><s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> that I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%> before <S%H6440>thee<s%>; for the <S%H1870>custom<s%> of <S%H802>women<s%> is upon me. And he <S%H2664>searched<s%>, but <S%H4672>found<s%> not the <S%H8655>images<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H2734>wroth<s%>, and <S%H7378>chode<s%> with <S%H3837>Laban<s%>: and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, What is my <S%H6588>trespass<s%>? what is my <S%H2403>sin<s%>, that thou hast so hotly <S%H1814>pursued<s%> after <S%H310>me<s%>?

<S%H3588>Whereas<s%> thou hast <S%H4959>searched<s%> all my <S%H3627>stuff<s%>, what hast thou <S%H4672>found<s%> of all thy <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H3627>stuff<s%>? <S%H7760>set<s%> it <S%H3541>here<s%> before my <S%H251>brethren<s%> and thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, that they may <S%H3198>judge<s%> <S%H996>betwixt<s%> us <S%H8147>both<s%>. searched: Heb. felt

This <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> have I been with thee; thy <S%H7353>ewes<s%> and thy she <S%H5795>goats<s%> have not cast their <S%H7921>young<s%>, and the <S%H352>rams<s%> of thy <S%H6629>flock<s%> have I not <S%H398>eaten<s%>.

That which was <S%H2966>torn<s%> of beasts I <S%H935>brought<s%> not unto thee; I bare the <S%H2398>loss<s%> of it; of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> didst thou <S%H1245>require<s%> it, whether <S%H1589>stolen<s%> by <S%H3117>day<s%>, or <S%H1589>stolen<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>.

Thus I was; in the <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H2721>drought<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> me, and the <S%H7140>frost<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>; and my <S%H8142>sleep<s%> <S%H5074>departed<s%> from mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

Thus have I been <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in thy <S%H1004>house<s%>; I served <S%H5647>thee<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for thy <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for thy <S%H6629>cattle<s%>: and thou hast <S%H2498>changed<s%> my <S%H4909>wages<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4489>times<s%>.

<S%H3884>Except<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, and the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, had been with me, surely thou hadst sent me <S%H7971>away<s%> now <S%H7387>empty<s%>. <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> mine <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and the <S%H3018>labour<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands<s%>, and <S%H3198>rebuked<s%> thee <S%H570>yesternight<s%>.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, These <S%H1323>daughters<s%> are my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and these <S%H1121>children<s%> are my <S%H1121>children<s%>, and these <S%H6629>cattle<s%> are my <S%H6629>cattle<s%>, and all that thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> is mine: and what can I <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto these my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> unto their <S%H1121>children<s%> which they have <S%H3205>born<s%>?
Now therefore come <S%H3212>thou<s%>, let us <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, I and thou; and let it be for a <S%H5707>witness<s%> between me and thee.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%>, and set it <S%H7311>up<s%> for a <S%H4676>pillar<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H3950>Gather<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>; and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H1530>heap<s%>: and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> there upon the <S%H1530>heap<s%>.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H3026>Jegarsahadutha<s%>: but <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H1567>Galeed<s%>. Jegarsahadutha: that is, The heap of witness, Chaldee Galeed: that is, The heap of witness, Heb.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, This <S%H1530>heap<s%> is a <S%H5707>witness<s%> between me and thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>. Therefore was the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1567>Galeed<s%>;

And <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>; <S%H834>for<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6822>watch<s%> between me and thee, when we are <S%H5641>absent<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> from <S%H7453>another<s%>. Mizpah: that is, A beacon, or, watchtower

If thou shalt <S%H6031>afflict<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, or if thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> other <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, no <S%H376>man<s%> is with us; <S%H7200>see<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5707>witness<s%> betwixt me and thee.
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, Behold this <S%H1530>heap<s%>, and behold this <S%H4676>pillar<s%>, which I have <S%H3384>cast<s%> betwixt me and thee;

This <S%H1530>heap<s%> be <S%H5707>witness<s%>, and this <S%H4676>pillar<s%> be <S%H5713>witness<s%>, that I will not pass <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H1530>heap<s%> to thee, and that thou shalt not pass <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H1530>heap<s%> and this <S%H4676>pillar<s%> unto me, for <S%H7451>harm<s%>.

The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H8199>judge<s%> betwixt us. And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> by the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>.

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>: and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and tarried all <S%H3885>night<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%>. offered: or, killed beasts

And <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> rose <S%H7925>up<s%>, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them: and <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto his <S%H4725>place<s%>.
